Trade/Device Name(s): BD Vacutainer K2EDTA Blood Collection Tubes
BD Vacutainer K3EDTA Blood Collection Tubes
Specimen Container(s): BD Vacutainer K2EDTA Blood Collection Tube
BD Vacutainer K3EDTA Blood Collection Tube
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Vacutainer K2EDTA and K3EDTA blood collection tubes for venous blood specimen collection, containment, preservation, and transport for hematology testing.
Indications for Use Summary: Evacuated, sterile, single-use tubes for collection, containment, preservation, and transport of human venous blood specimens for in vitro diagnostic testing in hematology including WBC, RBC, RDW, hemoglobin, hematocrit, MCV, MCH, MCHC, platelets, and 5-part WBC differential.
